metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1672 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A race condition exists in the Tang server functionality for key generationand key rotation. This flaw results in a small time window where Tangprivate keys become readable by other processes on the same host.

criterions.comment: tang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
